    #include <bits/stdc++.h>
    #define md 1000000007
    #define ll long long
    using namespace std;
     char a[100010];
    int b[100010];
    int main (){
    	#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    		freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);	
    	#endif
    	cin>>a;
    	int n=strlen(a);
    	int i=0;
    	int mn=n+1;
    	int mn2=n;
    	while(i<n){
    		if(a[i]=='T')
    		{	b[i]=mn;mn=mn2;mn2--;i++;}
    		else{
    			int j=i;
    			while(a[j]=='C' && j<n){
    				j++;
    			}
    			
    			int ct=mn-(j-i);
    			mn2=ct-1;
    			for(;i<j;i++)
    				b[i]=ct++;
    			mn=ct;
    		}
    	}
    	b[n]=mn;
    	for(int i=0;i<=n;i++)
    		printf("%d ",b[i]);
    	printf("\n");
    	
        return 0;
    }
